item.title: Update from Susan McGill
item.description: Congratulations to the OLYMPIC GOLD MEDAL CURLING TEAM, whom, I believe mostly train at The Peak here is Stirling.

item.title: Elections
item.description: Both votes SNP on the 6th May 2021. Vote Keith Brown for Clackmannanshire and Dunblane. This constituency includes Bridge of Allan.

item.title: Calendar
item.description: Bridge of Allan & Logie SNP have delivered their New Year calendar around houses and businesses for over 20 years.

item.title: Christmas Fun Night
item.description: We will be holding our Christmas Fun Night on zoom on Monday 14th December at 7pm.

item.title: Westminster and Holyrood Constituencies
item.description: Bridge of Allan and Logie is represented at Westminster, at Holyrood and on Stirling council

item.title: Branch Meetings
item.description: Branch Meetings Our branch meetings are on the second Monday of each month starting at 7.

item.title: Active for over Twenty Years
item.description: Welcome to the website of the Bridge of Allan & Logie branch of the Scottish National Party.
